XHEADER.Title: Log into Openstack and generate service catalogue

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Identity URL" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OPS_IDENTITY_URL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OPS_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Tenant Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OPS_TENANT_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Password" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OPS_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Action name : SET &UC4RB_OPS_ACTION_NAME# = "GET_AUTH_TOKEN"
! Define java options and values : DEFINE &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#, string, 8
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[1] = "-action" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[2] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[3] = "-baseurl" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_IDENTITY_URL#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[4] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[5] = "-username" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_USERNAME#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[6] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[7] = "-tenantname" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_TENANT_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[8] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
! Access key is decrypted and send to jar as argument : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_OPS_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Setting execution environment : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.SET_EXEC_ENVIRONMENT
! Invoking java binary :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" java -jar &UC4RB_OPS_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_OPS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# -password %UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD% : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" java -jar &UC4RB_OPS_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_OPS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# -password $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD : ENDIF :ENDIF
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** GET AUTH TOKEN ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** GET AUTH TOKEN ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
! Publishing login info to VARA object in case of success :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') :PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# <> "" : IF &VALUE# <> "" : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_OPS_TOKEN_ID" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_TOKEN_ID# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OPS_TOKEN_ID#,,"TOP" : ELSE : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_OPS_TENANT_ID" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_TENANT_ID# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OPS_TENANT_ID#,,"TOP" : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ELSE : PSET &UC4RB_OPS_TOKEN_ID# = "" : PSET &UC4RB_OPS_TENANT_ID# = "" : PSET &UC4RB_OPS_TOKEN_EXPIRY# = "" :ENDIF
